# preferredImageDynamicRange

**Instance Property**

The preferred dynamic range when displaying an image in the receiving image view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var preferredImageDynamicRange: NSImage.DynamicRange { get set }
```

## Specifying the dynamic range

- **imageDynamicRange**: The resolved dynamic range of the fully resolved image content.
- **defaultPreferredImageDynamicRange**: The default preferred image dynamic range.
